data.introduce: UATP(Universal Air Travel Plan)即环球航空旅行计划，是由全球多家航空公司拥有并经营的商务旅行付款系统。UATP信用卡支付验证服务主要用于使用UATP支付前校验信用卡是否有一定金额的支付能力。
data.business: 用于使用UATP支付方式前验证支付人的信用卡是否具有一定金额的支付能力，对应于主机的CCV指令。
data.functions:
该服务支持的功能范围如下：
1. 验证支付人的信用卡是否具有一定金额的支付能力
2. 验证通过后自动在PNR中添加相应的FP和RMK项
3. 一次可完成同一个PNR下的多次验证请求
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"OTA_AuthorizationRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付验证的请求输入","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AuthorizationDetail","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"旅客费用验证信息","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号：如：JE4Z9R","children":[]}]},{"name":"CreditCardAuthorization","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"信用卡授权信息","children":[{"name":"CreditCard","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡信息","children":[{"name":"@CardType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡类型：如：TP。
其中CardType为信用卡类型，有效的类型代码如下：
AX AmericanExpress？
 VI Visa？
 DC DinersClub
 MC MasterCard？
 TP AirTravelCard(UATP)
 DS Discover？
 JC JapanCreditBureau
 UP商务卡
KR Card","children":[]},{"name":"@CardNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡卡号","children":[]},{"name":"@ExpireDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡截止有效日期：格式为：MMYY，如0315","children":[]},{"name":"@InfantInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"婴儿备注：true为婴儿支付，false为成人支付，默认为成人支付","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"序号：如：1","children":[]},{"name":"@Currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码：如：CNY","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付金额：如：1140.00","children":[]},{"name":"@NumOfInstallment","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"分期月数。
当CardType的值为KR时，如果不输，默认为1，当CardType值不为KR时，该节点无效","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketingCarrier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票航司二字码。
当CardType的值为：VI,CA,MC,JC,JB,DC,DS,AX,KR时，@TicketingCarrier字段必输，两位字符；当CardType的值为UP,TP时，@TicketingCarrier字段选填，两位字符。","children":[]}]},{"name":"@PaymentTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付方式：如：CCV","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AuthorizationRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付验证的响应输出","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合：？","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Authorization","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"授权验证信息集合","children":[{"name":"AuthorizationDetail","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"旅客费用验证信息","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号：如：JE4Z9R","children":[]}]},{"name":"CreditCardAuthorization","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"信用卡授权信息","children":[{"name":"CreditCard","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡信息","children":[{"name":"@CardType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡类型：如：TP","children":[]},{"name":"@CardNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡卡号","children":[]},{"name":"@ExpireDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信用卡截止有效日期：格式为：MMYY，如0315","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结果序号","children":[]},{"name":"@Currency","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码：如：CNY","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付金额：如：1140.00","children":[]}]},{"name":"@PaymentTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付方式：如：CCV","children":[]}]},{"name":"AuthorizationResult","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"验证结果集合","children":[{"name":"@CCV_Result","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结果信息","children":[]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Indicate the sequence number of the authorization","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"验证结果的序号","children":[]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AuthorizationRQ xmlns="http://espeed.travelsky.com"

	xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" EchoToken="12345"

	TimeStamp="2003-07-17T09:30:47-05:00" Target="Production" Version="2.001">
    <!-- 销售方信息，包括销售Office等 -->
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191" />
    </POS>
    <!-- 验证信息 -->
    <AuthorizationDetail PaymentTypeCode="CCV">
        <!-- 支付方式，如CCV等 -->
        <BookingReferenceID ID="HRCR85"></BookingReferenceID>
        <!-- PNR号 -->
        <!--信用卡验证信息，包括：金额，卡类型，卡号，有效期，货币代码，序号等  -->
        <CreditCardAuthorization RPH="1" Amount="01.00" Currency="CNY">
            <CreditCard Amount="01.00" Currency="CNY"  CardType="TP" CardNumber="192099988050134" CardCode="TP" ExpireDate="0218" >
	         </CreditCard>
        </CreditCardAuthorization>
    </AuthorizationDetail>
</OTA_AuthorizationRQ>
